Class Lab4Model

extends java.lang.Object

      • encryptFile

        public void encryptFile(java.io.File inputFile,
                        java.io.File outputFile,
                        int key)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        creates input stream of the input file. Creates output stream of the output file. then calls the encryptStream method.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - The file that will be encrypted.
        outputFile - The file that is encrypted.
        key - The key that is used to encrypted.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • encryptStream

        public void encryptStream(java.io.InputStream in,
                          java.io.OutputStream out,
                          int key)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Takes the file that will be encrypted and reads it byte by byte. Then it writes the encrypted byte to a file. Calls the encrypt method.
        Parameters:
        in - input stream of the file being encrypted.
        out - outputStream of the file being
        key - The key that will be used to encrypt the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
